text:
Bread https://breadapp.com - REMOTE - FULL TIME - USA/CA/MEXICO

Hiring for experienced Android and iOS developers, Infrastructure (Kubernetes), backend (Go), frontend (JS) and plenty more. If you want to work at a very exciting and explosively growing crypto currency company please get in touch!

Check out https://breadapp.com/careers for more info. Not all jobs may be listed there. We're basically hiring for all roles so if you don't directly match one of the specified jobs please still email me, Samuel Sutch, the CTO. careers@breadapp.com
